articles.title: GST revenues at all-time high of Rs 1.68 lakh crore in April
articles.description: GST revenues in April touched the highest ever level of about Rs 1.68 lakh crore, up 20 per cent from the year-ago period, on improved compliance, the Finance Ministry said on Sunday. In April 2022, 1.06 crore GST returns in GSTR-3B were filed.
